医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
轮班工作和其他类型的非常规工作如何影响肠道微生物组研究人员回顾了不同的研究，分析了非常规工作对工人健康和肠道微生物群的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/How-shift-work-and-other-types-of-unconventional-work-affects-the-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/How-shift-work-and-other-types-of-unconventional-work-affects-the-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e90652bf-ba63-4347-8ee4-7e1ea34c58e7 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 10:12:00 -0400 How shift work and other types of unconventional work affects the gut microbiome
通货膨胀加剧，粮食不安全率达到 17%根据 6 月份的《消费者食品洞察报告》，报告的粮食不安全率已达到 17%，与 2022 年 3 月达到的水平持平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Food-insecurity-reaches-1725-as-inflation-bites.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Food-insecurity-reaches-1725-as-inflation-bites.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c085058-9f9f-405f-b6fc-1569d60436da Thu, 13 Jul 2023 10:03:52 -0400 Food insecurity reaches 17% as inflation bites
手术突破使截肢者能够以单指精度控制仿生手手臂截肢的人第一次可以像操纵自己的手指一样操纵仿生手的每个手指。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Surgical-breakthrough-allows-amputees-to-control-bionic-hands-with-single-finger- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Surgical-breakthrough-allows-amputees-to-control-bionic-hands-with-single-finger- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fabd277b-ddfb-4e17-80ec-165a3cf861d5 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 09:55:41 -0400 Surgical breakthrough allows amputees to control bionic hands with single-finger precision
TAVR 治疗主动脉瓣反流：超越“标签外”使用宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。经导管主动脉瓣置换术（TAVR）目前是手术风险高至低的严重症状性主动脉瓣狭窄患者广泛使用的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/TAVR-for-aortic-regurgitation-Moving-beyond-off-label-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/TAVR-for-aortic-regurgitation-Moving-beyond-off-label-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a01bcd2c-9612-4c14-875f-a7375d675ea6 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 09:49:30 -0400 TAVR for aortic regurgitation: Moving beyond "off-label" use
pAQ 监测器：创新设备可实时监测 SARS-CoV-2 气溶胶研究人员展示了病原体空气质量 (pAQ) 监测器的概念验证。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/pAQ-monitor-innovative-device-provides-real-time-surveillance-of-SARS-CoV-2-aerosols.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/pAQ-monitor-innovative-device-provides-real-time-surveillance-of-SARS-CoV-2-aerosols.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fd179ec-7899-449e-940c-341fa893e69f Thu, 13 Jul 2023 09:47:00 -0400 pAQ monitor: innovative device provides real-time surveillance of SARS-CoV-2 aerosols
新的精准医学试验显示出治疗罕见脑肿瘤的希望乳头状颅咽管瘤（PCP）是一种罕见的脑肿瘤，可导致患者大量发病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/New- precision-medicine-trial-shows-promise-for-treating-rare-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/New- precision-medicine-trial-shows-promise-for-treating-rare-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d95d6b19-7835-4372-8ff9-20659304bb95 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 09:44:51 -0400 New precision medicine trial shows promise for treating rare brain tumors

Evotec 与百时美施贵宝在神经科学合作伙伴关系中签订许可协议Evotec SE 今天宣布，百时美施贵宝公司已行使其选择权，签订独家全球许可协议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Evotec-and-Bristol-Myers-Squibb-enter-licence-agreement-within-neuroscience-partnership.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Evotec-and-Bristol-Myers-Squibb-enter-licence-agreement-within-neuroscience-partnership.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ece0b523-a121-4254-821d-7c0a27761e37 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 09:13:00 -0400 Evotec and Bristol Myers Squibb enter licence agreement within neuroscience partnership
食用昆虫对人类健康有何影响？对人类研究的系统回顾表明，昆虫蛋白在提供必需氨基酸和其他健康益处方面与其他蛋白质来源一样好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/What-are-the-effects-of-insect-conspiration-on- human-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/What-are-the-effects-of-insect-conspiration-on- human-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bb8c8f8-c525-4510-924d-8d81cbf78bf9 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 06:53:00 -0400 What are the effects of insect consumption on human health?
学校有牛奶吗？农民与健康倡导者就奶油“全”品种进行斗争阿曼达·康多 (Amanda Condo) 在她家位于宾夕法尼亚州的奶牛场工作，但她的儿子在学校经常不喝牛奶。他不喜欢这个味道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Got-milk-in-school-Farmers-fight-health-advocates-over-the-creamy-e28098wholee28099-variety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Got-milk-in-school-Farmers-fight-health-advocates-over-the-creamy-e28098wholee28099-variety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c0fc127-b740-47f3-849e-4e2bab0d58dd Thu, 13 Jul 2023 06:51:00 -0400 Got milk in school?
